attributes.action: Scrap the green taxes which are adding over 13% to energy bills.
attributes.additional_details: We are continuing in the ludicrous situation where UK citizens are being severely disadvantaged by their government which imposes high charges unilaterally while no other country on the planet is contributing to the same level, so just what is the point?  It has to be repeated that the people of the UK (including our politicians) will die in the same instant as the rest of the planet, when it implodes (or explodes) but will have suffered considerably more on the way there.  Green taxes are a waste of effort when only one EXTREMELY SMALL, AND NOW INSIGNIFICANT ON THE WORLD STAGE, ISLAND LIKE OURS and need to be scrapped now!
